headline: SEMICONSOFT THIN FILM MEASUREMENT SYSTEM VIS
description: Thin Film Measurement System    The MProbe 20VIS is a desktop thin-film thickness measurement system. The measurement is based on spectroscopic reflectance and uses fiber optics retro-reflecting probe.
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Deposition Equipment > Other Physical Vapor Deposition Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer SemiSoft Inc.
Model MProbe VIS20 In-situ
Description Thin Film Measurement -- Spectroscopic Reflectance
Vacuum System None
Accessories In-situ
Other Information Includes Lenovo T410 laptop with software and dongle.
